name: gitea
title: Gitea
description: Connects your Gitea instance to Raycast

preferences.name: baseUrl
preferences.title: Gitea Base URL
preferences.description: Base URL of your Gitea instance

preferences.name: accessToken
preferences.title: Access Token
preferences.description: Optional personal access token for private repositories

preferences.name: cacheTtlMinutes
preferences.title: Cache TTL (minutes)
preferences.description: How long to cache API results (repositories and pull request inbox)

preferences.name: debug
preferences.title: Debug Logging
preferences.label: Enable debug logs for Gitea API calls
preferences.description: Adds a 'Show Debug Info' action and logs request details for troubleshooting

preferences.name: quickOpen
preferences.title: Quick Open Repository
preferences.label: Open repositories directly instead of selecting a section
preferences.description: Skip the section picker when opening repositories

commands.name: gitea-pull-requests
commands.title: Gitea Pull Requests
commands.description: Shows open pull requests you created or are requested to review
commands.subtitle: Open pull request inbox

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
